Package it.areson.interdimension.runnables

Class RepeatingRunnable

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
it.areson.interdimension.runnables.RepeatingRunnable
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public abstract class RepeatingRunnable
extends org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
Wrapper for BukkitRunnable that hold the information to start and stop a repeating task.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private long delay
    Delay for the repeating task.
    private long interval
    Interval from one repetition to another.
    private org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin
    Plugin instance.

    Create a new Repeating Runnable.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract void run()  
    void runRepeatingTask()
    Run this repeating task.
    void stopRepeatingTask()
    Stop repeating this task.

  • Constructor Details

    • RepeatingRunnable

      public RepeatingRunnable​(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin, long delay, long interval)
      Create a new Repeating Runnable.
      Parameters:
      plugin - Plugin instance.
      delay - Delay of the first repetition.
      interval - Interval between repetitions.

  • Method Details

    • stopRepeatingTask

      public void stopRepeatingTask()
      Stop repeating this task. The task cannot be resumed.

    • runRepeatingTask

      public void runRepeatingTask()
      Run this repeating task. Stop it with stopRepeatingTask()

    • run

      public abstract void run()
